results.name: n is the a(n)-th positive integer having its digitsum in base-16 representation.
comment: Ordinal transform of A053836. - _Alois P. Heinz_, Dec 23 2018
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Digit Sum
program: f x m = y : f (x + 1) (insert q (y + 1) m) where
y = findWithDefault 1 q m; q = a053836 x
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 09 2015
